ProductInfo.Features:
24.1 megapixed DX-format image sensor
Shoot up to 6 frames per second for up to 100 continuous shots
Wireless sharing and control with WU-1a adapter (not included)
ISO range from 100 to 6400
1080p videos with full-time autofocus and built-in stereo mic
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera With 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR Lens + 55-200mm f/4-5.6G ED AF-S DX Autofocus Lens + 50mm f/1.8D Autofocus Lens + CS Pro's Kit: Includes 64gb SDHC Memory Card, SD Card Reader, 2 ENEL15 Replacement Batteries, Rapid Travel Charger, 3 Piece Filter Kit, High Definition Wide Angle Lens, 2x Telephoto HD Lens, Carrying Case, Cleaning Pen, Starters Kit & CS Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
